title: PSA: Disenchant any skin shards you don't plan to upgrade before preseason
body: Riot will  be devaluating the amount of Orange Essence you get from disenchanting skinshards when preseason rolls, so if you have any skin you probably won't be upgrading, it's best to disenchant them now, otherwise you'll be losing out on OE.

replies.body: No, they aren't. They've said OE will not have any changes done to it. Only BLUE Essence is getting changes.

>Skin shards value will be rebalanced for disenchanting resulting in slightly less when the changes come about - if you're planning on disenchanting, it's better to do it now :-)

I need proof of this, every single thing ive heard from riot says otherwise, oe and be will be changed(worth 1/6 as much) but you will be EXACTLY compensated(6x) for the change afterwards.

Need a source or this is false.

OE won't be changed, only BE will. What will be changed regarding OE is that you will get less from disenchanting shards, nothing else. You will also be getting less from disenchanting champion shards too, which is why Rioters themselves are telling people to disenchant both shards before preseason. 

BTW you'll **statistically** get more BE if you purchase mystery champion shards now and disenchant them than if you just keep the IP.
